name: Open Source Integration 4kids
short_description: This project will make a better understanding of open source software distribution. Upon integration and run time analysis of all Operating Systems, I have decided to integrate 4 operating systems in one. But this project needs the author's understanding, when it comes to compilation of  their respective apps, operating systems, and environments. I certainly sure that with your collaborations, we can make the Internet, Intranet, accessible to all Nations across the globe. To GOD be the glory, and GOD bless us.
summary: A project to include in the IIS Core server for students.
